FuncDef: The display ospfv3 request-list command displays the statistics of the request list of OSPFv3. The display ospfv3 request-list command displays the statistics of the request list of OSPFv3. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display ospfv3 [ <process-id> ] request-list [ statistics | { area { <area-id> | <area-ipv4> } | peer <neighbor-id> | interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the OSPFv3 process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays the statistics of the request list of OSPFv3.
-

Specifies an OSPFv3 area ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

Specifies an OSPFv3 area ID.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

The router ID of a neighbor.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-
